document.full_text: world number one caroline wozniacki suffered a surprise fourth-round defeat by germany's andrea petkovic in the sony ericsson open on monday, falling victim to a smart strategy from her lower-ranked opponent.
document.title: top seed wozniacki upset by german petkovic
lines_and_colors: world number one caroline wozniacki suffered a surprise fourth-round defeat by germany's andrea petkovic in the sony ericsson open on monday, falling victim to a smart strategy from her lower-ranked opponent.
